channel.title: HumidityX 667-712 ! We Are Back In Development!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/10pxcsh.png[/img]
[b]HumidityX:[/b] New Armour Looks/Bosses/Kill-Death/Titles/Minigames/Shops/Events
[b]Why Has HumidityX Been Offline?:[/b] Well actually I've been updating alot and im not like every other leacher, I actually do all the important updates get everything out of the way and then when players join I still continue to update. Furthermore, HumidityX Was offline because I was hacked on everything, some guy found out my pass to 1 of my accounts and thats the exact same password to EVERY single account I have except for Rune-Server and the other sites like google, Mopar etc. So My forums got hacked, my youtube account and I couldn't really continue advertising. Now I'm back!
[b]About HumidityX[/b] -Economy Based -Better trade -Gpi -Shops -Storm Of Arma & Polpore Staff -Re written skills -Dominion tower -Equipment stats fixes -Prices -Bonuses -Packed npc's & shops -Cache -Re written combat -Item wielding fixes -Item bonus on equipment stats fix -Global objects & Npchandling & spawning -New teleportations -New exp rates -Fixed dupes -Fixed exp rates -New skills -Summoning scrolls perfected -Auras (Activating, Deactivating, Recharging) -New tutorial -200+ players registered -Dedicated server -Bosses -Friendly Staff -Lunars/Ancients/Moderns -Curses (With Quick Prayers) -All Weapon Special Attacks -TokHar-Khal Cape -New Armours -Vps -News -
[b]PvP/Pking:[/b] - We have a perfected Pvp system. - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking. - Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds) - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP.
[b]PvM:[/b] - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon) - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows
[b]PvP And PvM:[/b] - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)
[b]Miscellaneous:[/b] - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - Flawless Music & Sound system - Perfect XP counter - Equipment Stats Fix - Gpi Fix - Item On Item - NpcHandling - NpcSpawning - Configurations - Implements
Client: * Java 7: [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre-7u3-download-1501631.html]http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre-7u3-download-1501631.html[/url]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2wp6ww5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/s2z884.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/5x8m6c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/ncz476.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2mqw1av.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/ayvbwl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2yo7ubr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ronspx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/e04b61.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/w7fv61.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2n9x4dg.png[/img]
[b]Credits:[/b] Humid Chronic Disturbed 704 V1 (For Base)
-------------------------------------------
[b]HumidityX Biography[/b]
To Be honest with you; On my projects: 317 377 428 503 508 525 614 I've just leached. Back in September I got my first 639 Source and I never really understood the lower revisions so I actually started coding for real since then and learning. Yes I was the owner of EyreScape639 and people to this day still use my release such as RawrScape & QuantumX. My Old name was Fox and my old server name was EyreScape.
Back In November I moved onto the FIRST EVER 667 on which today I still have that this is. A player named "thebacon" sold me the source and his friend can decompile clients so he gave me the decompiled Matrix client. I was one of the top 5 people to get it the earliest possible. Back then I payed for my 667 for $25 because I've always loved the higher revisions and were the only revisions I could use dispite the fact that other Rune-Server players would tell me to start at a 317. Now I have enhanced my knowledge, I'm not the best coder and like a human; yes I do get stuck but I literally love programming to the Extreme and would love to learn more and more. It would be kind of you guys to set me up with a few tips if possible and I literally ask for nothing more. You respect me and I respect you.
Since I got my 667 now for 6 months I have been working on my source and if you see my source layout like my classes, txt and java files It's totally different from when I got my source back then. I'll probably never release my source for another year or two (depends) however when I do release it, I would love people to take the oppertunity of my source and learn to program like I did. At the moment it's all Trial and error for me and as I mentioned above I would love some useful/helpful tips.
During my time with 667s I got the new client (matrix) which had malicious content in it which I was un aware of and I got banned on Rune-Server. I honestly didn't know about it, Mister Maggot my good friend removed it for me and since that day I have been unbanned, not to mention; I've never ever broken a rule on Rune-Server. I hope everyone appriciates my work like I do to theirs. You will most likeley never see me put a harrasfull post on a reply to a thread or another post or even anywhere because it's just the person I am. I treat people the way I'd like to be treated. I would just like to say thank you to all my friends in my programming/Rune-Server experiance so far; Erica, Beta, Vincent, Vin, Gf_u, Rudie, Eric (Fatality614), Chronic, Coombser (Old 317 Developer), Scu11, Sean, Poseidon (Apolo), Shabba56 (for the amazing Disturbed), Logan, VoltageScape (Tyler, Ben & Isaac) - hope you remember me Ex-Moderator Ags Vs Claws, James Lawrence, Mister Maggot, Sway, Irl Mate George Ashley, Rs Wiki, Tizen, Tyro, Zach, Rising King, and a few others at the back of my head...
Thanks For Reading,
Owner Of HumidityX 712,
Humid[/center]

item.title: HumidityX 667-712 ! We Are Back In Development!
item.dc:creator: @Humid Humid
item.description:
@Humid wrote:

[center]

HumidityX:
New Armour Looks/Bosses/Kill-Death/Titles/Minigames/Shops/Events

Why Has HumidityX Been Offline?:
Well actually I’ve been updating alot and im not like every other leacher, I actually do all the important updates get everything out of the way and then when players join I still continue to update. Furthermore, HumidityX Was offline because I was hacked on everything, some guy found out my pass to 1 of my accounts and thats the exact same password to EVERY single account I have except for Rune-Server and the other sites like google, Mopar etc. So My forums got hacked, my youtube account and I couldn’t really continue advertising. Now I’m back!

About HumidityX
-Economy Based
-Better trade
-Gpi
-Shops
-Storm Of Arma & Polpore Staff
-Re written skills
-Dominion tower
-Equipment stats fixes
-Prices
-Bonuses
-Packed npc’s & shops
-Cache
-Re written combat
-Item wielding fixes
-Item bonus on equipment stats fix
-Global objects & Npchandling & spawning
-New teleportations
-New exp rates
-Fixed dupes
-Fixed exp rates
-New skills
-Summoning scrolls perfected
-Auras (Activating, Deactivating, Recharging)
-New tutorial
-200+ players registered
-Dedicated server
-Bosses
-Friendly Staff
-Lunars/Ancients/Moderns
-Curses (With Quick Prayers)
-All Weapon Special Attacks
-TokHar-Khal Cape
-New Armours
-Vps
-News

PvP/Pking:

  • We have a perfected Pvp system.
  • We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking.
  • Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds)
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP.

PvM:

  • King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects
  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon)
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows

PvP And PvM:

  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)

Miscellaneous:

  • All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
  • Quick Chat 100%
  • Flawless Music & Sound system
  • Perfect XP counter
  • Equipment Stats Fix
  • Gpi Fix
  • Item On Item
  • NpcHandling
  • NpcSpawning
  • Configurations
  • Implements

Client: *
Java 7: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre-7u3-download-1501631.html

Humid
Chronic
Disturbed 704 V1 (For Base)

HumidityX Biography

To Be honest with you; On my projects: 317 377 428 503 508 525 614 I’ve just leached. Back in September I got my first 639 Source and I never really understood the lower revisions so I actually started coding for real since then and learning. Yes I was the owner of EyreScape639 and people to this day still use my release such as RawrScape & QuantumX. My Old name was Fox and my old server name was EyreScape.

Back In November I moved onto the FIRST EVER 667 on which today I still have that this is. A player named “thebacon” sold me the source and his friend can decompile clients so he gave me the decompiled Matrix client. I was one of the top 5 people to get it the earliest possible. Back then I payed for my 667 for $25 because I’ve always loved the higher revisions and were the only revisions I could use dispite the fact that other Rune-Server players would tell me to start at a 317. Now I have enhanced my knowledge, I’m not the best coder and like a human; yes I do get stuck but I literally love programming to the Extreme and would love to learn more and more. It would be kind of you guys to set me up with a few tips if possible and I literally ask for nothing more. You respect me and I respect you.

Since I got my 667 now for 6 months I have been working on my source and if you see my source layout like my classes, txt and java files It’s totally different from when I got my source back then. I’ll probably never release my source for another year or two (depends) however when I do release it, I would love people to take the oppertunity of my source and learn to program like I did. At the moment it’s all Trial and error for me and as I mentioned above I would love some useful/helpful tips.

During my time with 667s I got the new client (matrix) which had malicious content in it which I was un aware of and I got banned on Rune-Server. I honestly didn’t know about it, Mister Maggot my good friend removed it for me and since that day I have been unbanned, not to mention; I’ve never ever broken a rule on Rune-Server. I hope everyone appriciates my work like I do to theirs. You will most likeley never see me put a harrasfull post on a reply to a thread or another post or even anywhere because it’s just the person I am. I treat people the way I’d like to be treated. I would just like to say thank you to all my friends in my programming/Rune-Server experiance so far; Erica, Beta, Vincent, Vin, Gf_u, Rudie, Eric (Fatality614), Chronic, Coombser (Old 317 Developer), Scu11, Sean, Poseidon (Apolo), Shabba56 (for the amazing Disturbed), Logan, VoltageScape (Tyler, Ben & Isaac) - hope you remember me Ex-Moderator Ags Vs Claws, James Lawrence, Mister Maggot, Sway, Irl Mate George Ashley, Rs Wiki, Tizen, Tyro, Zach, Rising King, and a few others at the back of my head…

Thanks For Reading,

Owner Of HumidityX 712,

Humid[/center]
